word:
John beheld this company, and he says, "Let us be glad and rejoice, and give honor to Him: for the marriage of the Lamb is come, and His wife hath made herself ready. And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, 


                                 -19- 

clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints" [Revelation 19:7, 8].
